item.title: Google Adds Dresses to AI-Powered Virtual Try-On Offering - PYMNTS.com
item.description:
1. Google Adds Dresses to AI-Powered Virtual Try-On Offering  PYMNTS.com
  2. Virtually try on dresses with our AI shopping tool  The Keyword
  3. Google is making it easier to visualize yourself in different dress styles.  The Verge
  4. Google expands AI-powered virtual try-on tool to include dresses  TechCrunch
  5. EXCLUSIVE: Simkhai Takes Google’s Virtual Dress Try-on for a Twirl  WWD

item.title: Video game performers reach agreement with 80 video games on AI terms - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. Video game performers reach agreement with 80 video games on AI terms  The Associated Press
  2. Video game actors’ strike: SAG-AFTRA says 80 games have agreed to its AI terms  Los Angeles Times
  3. SAG-AFTRA Says 80 Video Games Signed to Deals During Strike Against Major Studios  Hollywood Reporter
  4. Voice Actor Strike Makes Progress as Last Sentinel Dev Signs AI Protection Agreement [Update: 80 Games Agree to Terms]  IGN
  5. SAG-AFTRA Says 80 Video Games Agreed To Proposed AI Terms, A Blow For Major Developers Amid Strike  Deadline
